description: Substantial quantities of alcohol are seized along with beer taps, kegs and spirit dispensers.
title: Coronavirus: Three shebeens searched by police in Republic
title_page: Coronavirus: Three shebeens searched by police in Republic - BBC News
maintext: Under the Republic of Ireland's level three coronavirus restrictions, pubs and restaurants are not allowed to serve anyone indoors and can only provide takeaway or outdoor service to a maximum of 15 people.
